projects.title: Azure Pet Store
projects.description: A web-based app for a pet store and three microservices for the pet store that are deployed on Azure App Service (petstoreapp) and Azure Kubernetes Service (petstorepetservice, petstoreproductservice, and petstoreorderservice).

projects.title: Cloud Resume Challenge
projects.description: The Cloud Resume Challenge is a project that involves building a personal resume website and deploying it using various cloud services. I used Azure for construction of this resume website.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: This is the website you are on right now. It's an online portfolio made with Gatsby, GitHub and Azure Static Web Apps. It makes use of CI/CD using GitHub Actions to automatically build and deploy after each commit.
